section.title: Overview
section.p: Inspect for leaks and damage in the Aftertreatment Fuel Injector (AFTFI).

ol.li:
Inspect AFTFI and exhaust pipe visually for leaks and damage.
Figure 1108 Exhaust and Aftertreatment System OEName: 0000359541
Visually inspect for leaks, kinks, bends, or other damage in the Aftertreatment Fuel Injector (AFTFI) fuel supply line (Figure 1108) and coolant supply and return lines (Figure 1108).
Remove the AFTFI and discard gasket.

Perform visual inspection for the following:
AFTFI (Figure 1108) and bore (Figure 1108) are free of carbon buildup and unrestricted.
Tip of the AFTFI is free of cracks and other visible damage.
Install AFTFI back with new gasket.

section.title: Expected Outcome
section.p: The AFTFI will be inspected for leakage and/or damage by the technician. Also, inspect if the AFTFI fuel supply, and coolant supply and return lines are leaking, kinked, bent, or damaged.
